channel.title: hugo on Ian Ovenell
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Ian Ovenell

item.title: Creating a Hugo site on GitHub Pages
item.description: Creating a Hugo site on GitHub Pages So I’ve just begun my journey as a web developer and I was stumbling along trying to create a website when I came across an awesome static site generator called Hugo! This is my first post so I hope it’s useful :) Hugo self-proclaims that they are the “fastest framework for building websites,” and I have to say they’ve made the task pretty simple even for a beginner like me!
